topics.body:
"@SuperSupermario24":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ad305d63687261060017c4#post_55ad305d63687261060017c4
I don't actually remember the day I started playing TF2.
I started my account in September 11 2009, but I really started using TF2 around 2011.
The calculator says I play 2.23 hours of TF2 per day.

Hmmm...
